Hello...

My name is Brandon. Welcome to my portfolio website!

I'm a front-end web developer and currently learning full-stack development.

Learn More Contact Me

About Me

I have spent over 12 years working in the IT industry. However, I have been learning web development on the side for many years. I am anxious to make the jump into a web development career!

I'm a front-end developer that specializes in JavaScript and React with a focus on single-page applications. Lately I have also began learning and building full-stack applications using PHP. I have used NodeJS for various practice projects as well.

Outside of work, some of my favorite things to do are spending time with my family, watching or playing sports (baseball, racing, basketball), billiards, and playing the guitar. I also am an FAA certified pilot and former flight instructor.

Please check out my LinkedIn profile for more information about me.

An older project of mine. It uses the HTML canvas element and JavaScript, to allow you to create diagrams of the various guitar chords.
